title: What are the best hotels in Los Angeles under $100 and clean
excerpt: Finding clean and affordable hotels in Los Angeles can feel like searching for a needle in a haystack, especially with the city's reputation for luxury accommodations. This curated list not only highlights budget-friendly options but also ensures that each hotel meets cleanliness standards, making your stay comfortable and worry-free. By focusing on these criteria, travelers can enjoy the vibrant culture of LA without breaking the bank or compromising on quality.
intro: Explore the top hotels in Los Angeles that offer both affordability and cleanliness, perfect for budget-conscious travelers seeking a memorable stay.

With nearby highlights such as Exposition Park and SoFi Stadium, this motel is the perfect base for exploring the best of the city.

Make Satellite Motel your ideal home away from home during your stay.
